      <!--Card Container-->
      <div class="card">
        <!--Card content-->
        <div class="card-block">
          <!--Title-->
          <h4 class="card-title"><a href="">Card title</a></h4>
          <hr>
          <!--Text-->
          <p class="card-text">...</p>
        </div>
        <!--/.Card content-->
        <!--Card Footer-->
        <div class="card-footer">
          <ul class="card-action-list">
            ...
          </ul>
        </div>
        <!--/Card Footer-->
      </div>
      <!--/.Card container-->

Horizontal position

  • create by Woody

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Fugiat illum animi, tempora. Exercitationem earum minima impedit officiis sint molestiae.

      
      <!--Card Container-->
      // use .horizontal-card for horizontal position
      <div class="card">
        <!--Card image-->
        <div class="card-image">
          <img class="img-fluid" src="">
          <div class="img-overlay">
            <a href="">
              <i class="fa fa-align-left" aria-hidden="true"></i> Read more..
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!--/.Card image-->
        <!--Card content-->
        <div class="card-block">
          <!--Title-->
          <h4 class="card-title"><a href="">Card title</a></h4>
          <hr>
          <!--Text-->
          <p class="card-text">...</p>
        </div>
        <!--/.Card content-->
        <!--Card Footer-->
        <div class="card-footer">
          <ul class="card-action-list">
            ...
          </ul>
        </div>
        <!--/Card Footer-->
      </div>
      <!--/.Card container-->

        </div>
        <div class="card-block">
          <!--Name-->
          <h4 class="card-title text-center">Anna Doe</h4>
          <hr>
          <!--Quotation-->
          <address>
            ...
        </address>
        </div>
      </div>
      <!--/.Card-->

      <!--image card-->
      <div class="card image-card">
        <!--Card image-->
        <div class="card-image">
          <img class="img-fluid" src="">
          <div class="img-overlay"></div>
        </div>
        <!--Card content-->
        <div class="card-block">
          <!--Title-->
          <h4 class="card-title"><a href="">Card title</a></h4>
          <!--post info-->
          <ul class="card-info">
            ...
          </ul>
          <!--Text-->
          <p class="card-text">...</p>
          <ul class="card-action-list right">
            ..
          </ul>
          <ul class="card-action-list">
            <li><span class="label label-small label-warning">HOT</span></li>
          </ul>
        </div>
        <!--/.Card content-->
        <!--/.Card image-->
      </div>
      <!--/image card-->
